channel.title: Pre-Sale Questions
channel.description: Do you have questions before you purchase one of our styles? This is the place to ask.

item.title: can we use apex with any language
item.author: invalid@example.com (saka)
item.dc:creator: saka
item.content:encoded:
hello,

Ä± would like to buy apex theme.
Can i use it in my turkish language forum?
https://pixelexit.com/products/apex.10/

item.title: Rosters List
item.author: invalid@example.com (ConfusedGiraffe)
item.dc:creator: ConfusedGiraffe
item.content:encoded: I'm looking at picking up the rosters addon for one of my guild sites but the "joined" date on the roster list is useless to me. I saw that you support custom fields but can you edit/remove the default ones?

item.title: Product page is confusing... can't find styles
item.author: invalid@example.com (cdub)
item.dc:creator: cdub
item.content:encoded:
I literally cannot find the product page for Flat Awesome Plus Dark. It isn't there. There's no way for me to buy it.

You have most "Latest Updates" and "Newest Products" on the sort.

Flat Awesome Plus dark isn't on either. Is it included on regular Flat Awesome? Because it doesn't say that anywhere.

I also submitted a request for a custom quote but nobody got back to me.

item.title: Teamspeak Integration Widgets
item.author: invalid@example.com (ConfusedGiraffe)
item.dc:creator: ConfusedGiraffe
item.content:encoded: For the Teamspeak XenPorta widgets, is there a button to join the queried server?

item.title: Roster + User Group?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Commodore)
item.dc:creator: Commodore
item.content:encoded:
Thinking of purchasing Rosters add on.

How does this work from an admin perspective? Do we need to set up xenforo user groups and then set up the roster? Or does it sync automatically? Seems redundant.

How much power does a user have in the Roster addon? Or does the admin have to do everything?

item.title: Halloween style
item.author: invalid@example.com (vapersguild)
item.dc:creator: vapersguild
item.content:encoded: Is there a paid version of the Halloween version skin available?

item.title: Custom styles and XF 2.0
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ebla)
item.dc:creator: Ebla
item.content:encoded: Is it too soon for you to know how difficult it will be down the road to convert one of your styles to the coming XF 2.0? I know it will be a while with plug-ins needing to be updated, but I am trying to decide budgets and if I should hold off. Thanks

item.title: Custom development (Add-on) for XenForo
item.author: invalid@example.com (kaieivindm)
item.dc:creator: kaieivindm
item.content:encoded:
Hi guys,

Will you be able to help with a custom add-on I need? Rather big task I assume and should be quite cool and challenging?!

item.title: Can you make a matching wordpress theme?
item.author: invalid@example.com (doublespaces)
item.dc:creator: doublespaces
item.content:encoded: My site is integrated with XenWord between XF and WP. Can you or do you make matching themes? Currently have Adara.

item.title: Does Flat Awesome style allows nodes to be displayed in columns?
item.author: invalid@example.com (cloferba)
item.dc:creator: cloferba
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I'd like to know if it's possible to display the nodes in columns just like this style:
http://audentio.com/demo/xf/index.php?misc/style&style_id=3

View attachment 4525

Thank you

item.title: Are we able to edit as we please?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Spark)
item.dc:creator: Spark
item.content:encoded:
Are we allowed to modify the style at all (no removing copyrights of course).

Just wondering before I buy

item.title: fragzone theme
item.author: invalid@example.com (CarryASS)
item.dc:creator: CarryASS
item.content:encoded:
before i am buying this https://pixelexit.com/demo/?theme=Frag Zone
i want to know how it will look in hebrew(https://xenforo.com/community/resources/hebrew-language-pack.2428/)
how can i check how it will look?

item.title: Ticket system agent anti-collision system?
item.author: invalid@example.com (luiss)
item.dc:creator: luiss
item.content:encoded:
Hello, does the ticket system have this feature? so just one agent will reply instead of 2 or more at the same time?

Thanks

item.title: What theme is this forum using?
item.author: invalid@example.com (beachdude)
item.dc:creator: beachdude

item.title: A couple questions about the Frag-Zone template...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Iqtidar)
item.dc:creator: Iqtidar
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
I like the Frag Zone template but have a few questions.

#1: Are the 3 backgrounds easily changeable from the Admin?
#2: We can have more than 3 or less than 3 backgrounds?
#3: Is the template expandable to full-width instead of in-grid width?

Thanks !
